/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV006QMapper.selectLoadSttcList */
SELECT AUD_YR ,STTC_TIT1 ,STTC_COL1 ,STTC_COL2 ,STTC_COL3 ,VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT YR AS AUD_YR ,YR || '년' AS STTC_TIT1 ,SUM(AUD_CNT) AS STTC_COL1 ,SUM(REQ_CNT) AS STTC_COL2 ,SUM(STORE_CNT) AS STTC_COL3 ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1), 0, 4) - 1 > YR THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END VIEW_YN FROM ( SELECT T1.YR AS YR ,COUNT(DISTINCT T2.AUD_SBJ_NM) AS AUD_CNT ,SUM(T3.CNT) AS REQ_CNT ,COUNT(T3.YR) AS STORE_CNT FROM TBBADJFS001M T1 ,TBBADDED001M T2 ,(SELECT YR ,DPT_CD ,SLN ,MNTY_ORG_NM ,BRC_NM ,COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM TBBADJFS002D WHERE YR BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1), 'YYYY') AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1), 'YYYY') AND MNTY_ORG_NM IS NOT NULL GROUP BY YR ,DPT_CD ,SLN ,MNTY_ORG_NM ,BRC_NM ) T3 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.AUD_YR = T2.AUD_YR AND T1.AUD_NO = T2.AUD_NO AND T1.YR = T3.YR AND T1.DPT_CD = T3.DPT_CD AND T1.SLN = T3.SLN AND T1.YR BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1), 'YYYY') AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1), 'YYYY') GROUP BY T1.YR ,T2.AUD_SBJ_NM ) GROUP BY YR ORDER BY YR DESC) UNION ALL SELECT T2.AUD_YR ,T2.STTC_TIT1 ,T2.STTC_COL1 ,T2.STTC_COL2 ,T2.STTC_COL3 ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '01' AND T2.AUD_YR = (SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(T2.AUD_YR)-1) FROM TWFAACAV200D T2 WHERE T2.STTC_CLSF_CD = '006' AND T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(T3.STTC_TYP_SEQ) FROM TWFAACAV200M T3 WHERE T3.STTC_CLSF_CD = '006' AND T3.STTC_DTM_DY IS NOT NULL)) THEN 'N' WHEN T1.STTC_YR -1 > T2.AUD_YR THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END VIEW_YN FROM TWFAACAV200M T1 INNER JOIN TWFAACAV200D T2 ON ( T1.STTC_TYP_CD = T2.STTC_TYP_CD AND T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = T2.STTC_CLSF_CD AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ) WHERE T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = '006' AND T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(T3.STTC_TYP_SEQ) FROM TWFAACAV200M T3 WHERE T3.STTC_CLSF_CD = '006' AND T3.STTC_DTM_DY IS NOT NULL) AND T2.AUD_YR BETWEEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -61),0,4) AND SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt},-13),0,4)

/* kr.go.bai.eip.aep.arp.dao.FAACAV006QMapper.selectSttcList */ SELECT T1.RMK ,T1.ADM_OPIN ,TO_CHAR(T1.STTC_PROD_STAD_DY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STTC_PROD_STAD_DY ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_DTM_DY IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS STTC_DTM_YN ,T2.STTC_TYP_CD ,T2.STTC_CLSF_CD ,T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ,T2.STTC_DATA_SNO ,T2.STTC_TIT1 ,T2.STTC_COL1 ,T2.STTC_COL2 ,T2.STTC_COL3 ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_YR -2 > T2.AUD_YR THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END VIEW_YN ,T2.AUD_YR ,T2.ROW_KND_CD ,NVL(TO_CHAR(T1.STTC_DTM_DY,'YYYY"-"MM"-"DD'),'미확정') AS STTC_DTM_DY FROM TWFAACAV200M T1 INNER JOIN TWFAACAV200D T2 ON ( T1.STTC_TYP_CD = T2.STTC_TYP_CD AND T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = T2.STTC_CLSF_CD AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ) WHERE T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = '006' AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = #{sttcTypSeq} ORDER BY STTC_DATA_SNO

/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV006QMapper.insertMaster */
INSERT INTO TWFAACAV200M ( STTC_TYP_CD ,STTC_CLSF_CD ,STTC_TYP_SEQ ,STTC_YR ,STTC_STR_MON ,STTC_END_MON ,STTC_PROD_STAD_DY ,STTC_DTM_DY ,RMK ,ADM_OPIN ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( '10' ,'006' ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '006' ) ,SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1), 0, 4) ,'01' ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1)), 'MM') ,#{proStadDt} ,'' ,#{rmk} ,#{admOpin} ,#{usrId} ,#{usrId} ,#{dptCd} ,#{mnuId} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE )

/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV006QMapper.insertDetail */
INSERT INTO TWFAACAV200D ( STTC_TYP_CD ,STTC_CLSF_CD ,STTC_TYP_SEQ ,STTC_DATA_SNO ,STTC_TIT1 ,STTC_COL1 ,STTC_COL2 ,STTC_COL3 ,AUD_YR ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( '10' ,'006' ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '006' ) ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_DATA_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM TWFAACAV200D WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '006' AND STTC_TYP_SEQ = ( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '006' )) ,#{sttcTit1} ,#{sttcCol1} ,#{sttcCol2} ,#{sttcCol3} ,#{audYr} ,#{usrId} ,#{usrId} ,#{dptCd} ,#{mnuId} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE )
